text:
- [Narrator] Tired of the
tedious time consuming process

with Amazon Q Developer, our
generative AI coding assistant.
In your IDE, type /transform in the prompt
and Q will take care of the rest.
to Java 17 in just a few steps.

upgrades the necessary
dependencies and deprecated code,

and runs all the unit tests
to ensure nothing is broken.

You can then validate all code
changes across all the files

before applying them to your
project with a single click.
What used to take days and hours
can now be done in just a few minutes.
Don't let outdated code hold you back.

Embrace the future of development
with Amazon Q Developer
available in your favorite IDE today.
